title: Permanent Inkbrush
paragraphs: The Permanent Inkbrush is a main weapon in Splatoon and Splatoon 2. It is a recolored Inkbrush with a different sub weapon and special weapon loadout.

The Permanent Inkbrush shares its overall design with the Inkbrush. However, the Permanent Inkbrush's handle is red instead of blue, there is a small sticker on the ferrule, and the bristles are slightly darker.
The Permanent Inkbrush is one of eight weapons included in Sheldon's Picks Vol. 1 and was released at  02:00 UTC on 13 April 2016.[1] It comes with Splat Bombs and Kraken.
- An Inkling holds the Permanent Inkbrush.
- Flicking ink from the Permanent Inkbrush.
The Permanent Inkbrush was released on 3 April 2019 at 01:00 UTC as part of Version 4.6.0.[4] It comes with Sprinklers and Ink Armor.
For competitive tips about the Permanent Inkbrush
"Permanent" refers to permanent markers and permanent ink.
